item.title: About
item.description: Father of two adorable children. Programming enthusiast. Backend developer with several years of commercial experience. Lifelong learner.

AWS Certified Solutions Architect - Professional Domain % of Examination 1. Design for Organizational Complexity 12.5% 2. Design for New Solutions 31% 3. Migration Planning 15% 4. Cost Control 12.5% 5. Continuous Improvement for Existing Solutions 29% TOTAL 100% Domain 1: Design for Organizational Complexity 1.1. Determine cross-account authentication and access strategy for complex organizations (for example, an organization with varying compliance requirements, multiple business units, and varying scalability requirements).
